paragraphs.text:
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql._
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext

result.msg:
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql._
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext

paragraphs.text:
// load news
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "news", "keyspace" -> "test_news"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "ds", "disease", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr", "product", "organization", "impact")
  .withColumn("source", lit("news"))

var df2 = df.filter($"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
df2 = df2.filter(array_contains(df("disease"), 26696) || array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

// load twitter
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "twitter", "keyspace" -> "processed_social"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "ds","disease", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr", "product", "organization","klout")
  .withColumnRenamed("klout", "impact")
  .withColumn("source", lit("twitter"))

df = df.filter($"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
df = df.filter(array_contains(df("disease"), 26696) || array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

// load reddit
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "reddit", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "ds", "disease", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr", "product", "organization", "ups")
  .withColumnRenamed("ups", "impact")
  .withColumn("source", lit("reddit"))

df = df.filter($"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
df = df.filter(array_contains(df("disease"), 26696) || array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

// load forum
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "forum", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "ds", "disease", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr", "product", "organization", "ups")
  .withColumnRenamed("ups", "impact")
  .withColumn("source", lit("forum"))
  
df = df.filter($"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
df = df.filter(array_contains(df("disease"), 26696) || array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

df2: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: string, disease: array<double>, url: string, description: string, title: string, sentiment: int, place_list: array<struct<geo_geonameid:double,place_id:int,place_name:string,place_lat:float,place_lng:float>>, cr: timestamp]

paragraphs.text:
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "news", "keyspace" -> "test_news"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "organization", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "impact", "cr")
  .filter(size($"organization")>0 && $"cr" >= "2016-01-01").filter("impact is not null")
  .withColumn("source", lit("news"))
  
var df2 = df

var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "twitter", "keyspace" -> "processed_social"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "organization", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list","klout", "cr")
  .withColumnRenamed("klout", "impact")
  .filter(size($"organization")>0 && $"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
  .withColumn("source", lit("twitter"))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "reddit", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "organization", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "score", "cr")
  .withColumnRenamed("score", "impact")
  .filter(size($"organization")>0 && $"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
  .withColumn("source", lit("reddit"))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "forum", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "organization", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "score", "cr")
  .withColumnRenamed("score", "impact")
  .filter(size($"organization")>0 && $"cr" >= "2016-01-01")
  .withColumn("source", lit("forum"))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

paragraphs.text:
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "news", "keyspace" -> "test_news"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "product", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "impact", "cr")
  .withColumn("source", lit("news"))
  
var df2 = df.filter(array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "twitter", "keyspace" -> "processed_social"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "product", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr")
  .withColumn("source", lit("twitter"))
  
df = df.filter(array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "reddit", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "product", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr")
  .withColumn("source", lit("reddit"))
  
df = df.filter(array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "reddit", "keyspace" -> "processed_forum"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "product", "url", "description", "title", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr")
  .withColumn("source", lit("forum"))
  
df =df.filter(array_contains(df("product"), 1012))

df2 = df2.unionAll(df)

paragraphs.text:
var df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "news", "keyspace" -> "test_news"))
  .load()
  .select("id", "disease", "url", "description", "title", "dom", "sentiment", "place_list", "cr")
  .withColumn("dom2", regexp_replace(lower($"dom"), """https://|www.|http://|/""", ""))
  .withColumn("source", lit("news"))
  
var df2 = df.filter(array_contains(df("disease"), 26696) && $"cr" >= "2016-01-01").join(alexa, df("dom2")===alexa("url2"), "left").na.fill(0,Seq("impact"))
